school_id.description: Unique school ID as followed by country's school system

education_level.description: Education level provided at the school

school_contact_email.description: Official email address of the school

school_contact_phone.description: Official phone number of the school

school_region.description: Type of region to which the school belongs

admin_1.description: Name of highest geographical admin level - country

admin_2.description: Name of 2nd highest geographical admin level - states

admin_3.description: Name of 3rd highest geographical admin level - districts/province/[country-specific name]

admin_4.description: Name of 4th highest geographical admin level - town/village/[country-specific name]

internet_availability.description: Availability of internet at the school

internet_type.description: Type of Internet connectivity available in the school

internet_generation.description: Type of internet generation at the school (if internet type = cellular)

internet_speed_Mbps.description: Average download speed of the internet measured at the school

desired_internet_speed_Mbps.description: Desired internet access speed in the school based on students count, desired computer count & national standards

network_coverage.description: Whether internet coverage is available in and around school area.

network_coverage_type.description: Type of internet generation coverage available in and around school area.

water_availability.description: Availability of drinking water at the school

classroom_count.description: Count of classrooms in the school

computer_count.description: Count of computers in the school

desired_computer_count.description: Desired count of computers in the school based on students count & national standards

student_count.description: Count of students in the school

teacher_count.description: Count of teachers in the school

student_count_girls.description: Count of girl students in the school

student_count_boys.description: Count of boys students in the school

student_count_other.description: Count of other students in the school

school_year.description: Year when school data was last updated

fiber_node_distance.description: Distance to the nearest fiber optical connection node, km
